name: Text Land
description:
This a prototype game idea revolving around the idea of using a text parser to navigate a plaformer. It is very short and only accepts a few basic commands.

Wanted to create something that is quite abstract but has familar roots.

You can get basic game instructions by typing the command 'help' in game.

Use the escape key to quit any time.

Created as part of a game design master's course at Brunel University London.

Created in Clickteam Fusion 2.5
